just a heads up i got a letter from my internet for downloading this. confusing cause i have peer block. I thought that took care of this problem wtf? Is there another way to prevent this?

Cinavia will stop you from viewing on PS3's or newer Blurays.  PC, XBox and pretty much any streaming-capable set top box should work fine though.  I streamed through my 360 with tversity when viewing failed on PS3 and it worked fine.

Otherwise if you strip the audio out and play it separate it will work (Cinavia is an audio watermark) but that's more of a pain than its worth.
